title: CryptoGM
author: CryptoGM
created_time: August 19, 2022, 05:28:11 PMLast edit: October 06, 2022, 11:13:12 AM by CryptoGM
content: Hello,At coinweez.com we invite crypto projects who would love to place web banner ads with us. We are a crypto and blockchain-focused hub spot with impressive traffic stats. Traffic on our sites mainly are from the following leading crypto markets; USA, China, Singapore, Canada Estonia, Vietnam, Dubai, Nigeria and Kenya.Options available:1. Top header banner ad - $1000 covering a 3-month period2. Side banner ad - $550 covering a 3 month periodContact us via email contact@coinweez.com or add on Telegram @ICO_Services. We also offer publishing press releases at a cost of $300. If you need a writer to help with the PR writing this attracts an extra cost of $150 per PR.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoGM on August 19, 2022, 05:28:11 PMHello,At coinweez.com we invite crypto projects who would love to place web banner ads with us. We are a crypto and blockchain-focused hub spot with impressive traffic stats. Traffic on our sites mainly are from the following markets; USA, China, Singapore, Estonia, Vietnam, Dubai, Nigeria and Kenya.this sounds fantastic but how much is really realistic? can you share the statistics here, at least part of them? for example in August 2022? whether it is organic or paid traffic?I'm suspicious because the content on your site is quite outdated. the latest I've seen is from May 2022 and most of the others are from the 2018-2021 period. for such a topic, news that is a few years old is quite irrelevant.

comments.author: CryptoGM
comments.body: Hello, thank you for the feedback. Traffic on our site is 100% organic, I will edit and share the stats later on as we are restructuring our operations including sharing more articles on the site.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: I checked your statistics on similarweb with their estimated traffic for your site. I also checked your site on moz analytics, it shows that you have huge number of spam score and lower DA. Seems like your prices are overboard for me.

comments.author: CryptoGM
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on September 03, 2022, 07:21:00 AMI checked your statistics on similarweb with their estimated traffic for your site. I also checked your site on moz analytics, it shows that you have huge number of spam score and lower DA. Seems like your prices are overboard for me.Hello,If you willing to place a request with us kindly contact @ICO_Services you will discuss more with him including a favorable price.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: You have a website with good content but unfortunately, the two bad reviews on your account will have a bad impact on your offer, you also offer: QuoteWe also offer publishing press releases at a cost of $300. If you need a writer to help with the PR writing this attracts an extra cost of $150 per PR.Seriously PR release? when you are accused and proven to plagiarize content, your offer is unrealistic and people will not believe what you're saying about stat it should be coming from a third party but you have not provided a third party stat of your website.

comments.author: CryptoGM
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on September 25, 2022, 09:30:53 AMYou have a website with good content but unfortunately, the two bad reviews on your account will have a bad impact on your offer, you also offer: QuoteWe also offer publishing press releases at a cost of $300. If you need a writer to help with the PR writing this attracts an extra cost of $150 per PR.Seriously PR release? when you are accused and proven to plagiarize content, your offer is unrealistic and people will not believe what you're saying about stat it should be coming from a third party but you have not provided a third party stat of your website.I have nothing to hide mate, the negative reviews on this account are well explained under respective thread! It was an error on the project side who went on to copy and paste content sourced from another party even without referencing the source. If I was being unscrupulous as you wish to allude I can open a new account and post such ads but that's not something I am willing to do.

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: The link provided here is being directed to another site. Please check, maybe there is a mistake.

comments.body: Quote from: r_victory on October 14, 2022, 06:20:59 PMThe link provided here is being directed to another site. Please check, maybe there is a mistake.Please check this one https://t.me/ICO_Services

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoGM on October 21, 2022, 08:58:53 AMActiveWhat exactly is active? your site Coinweez.com is definitely not active. it seems that your hosting account has been suspended, you need to check it.things like this should definitely not happen considering that you are selling advertising space on that page. Who wants to pay for something that won't always be online?

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on October 21, 2022, 09:30:55 AMQuote from: CryptoGM on October 21, 2022, 08:58:53 AMActiveWhat exactly is active? your site Coinweez.com is definitely not active. it seems that your hosting account has been suspended, you need to check it.things like this should definitely not happen considering that you are selling advertising space on that page. Who wants to pay for something that won't always be online?Hahaha! That's hilarious!OP, you're trying to rent banner space on your site and can't even afford cheap cPanel hosting for it? I know you're trying to make a big impression, but this makes it seem like you're cutting corners at every turn. You're probably using some kind of cheap shared hosting. If you want to make money from your website, then the hosting should be a priority. You can't expect people to view your site if it is offline most of the time or slow to load. It's not exactly going to make people want to do business with you.

comments.author: Princeqq
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoGM on August 19, 2022, 05:28:11 PMHello,At coinweez.com we invite crypto projects who would love to place web banner ads with us. We are a crypto and blockchain-focused hub spot with impressive traffic stats. Traffic on our sites mainly are from the following leading crypto markets; USA, China, Singapore, Canada Estonia, Vietnam, Dubai, Nigeria and Kenya.Options available:1. Top header banner ad - $1000 covering a 3-month period2. Side banner ad - $550 covering a 3 month periodContact us via email contact@coinweez.com or add on Telegram @ICO_Services. We also offer publishing press releases at a cost of $300. If you need a writer to help with the PR writing this attracts an extra cost of $150 per PR. I don't want to sale trash here but you're asking for 1k banner ad on your website that doesn't even has more than 5k monthly visitors? (Statistics from similarweb, you can search it too)
